summary: Edited in NPC editor, given him demon eyes
descriptionHtml:
This is a face/hair edit done with the NPC editor. You will only see his new appearance after you have completed the relevant quests to make Cicero your follower. This is because there are multiple versions of the Cicero NPC. I have only edited the version that becomes your follower.

REQUIRES APACHII HAIRS

Mods used in screenshots:
natural eyes
sundracon's males
younger faces
tera armours
demon horns

Note: I am aware this mod shows up under mod searches for other games. This is an issue/bug with the Nexus website itself. I have confirmed from my end that this was correctly uploaded and listed as a SKYRIM mod.
author: sorrynameused
